definition: lit. to celebrate peace with songs and dance (idiom)/fig. to make a show of happiness and prosperity

sentences.english: Song and dance performances were then staged.
Can also enjoy to imitate Tang's music and song and dances in Xian, taste article Tang's vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 在西安还可以欣赏到仿唐音乐和歌舞，尝品唐菜。

sentences.english: We have an English Speaking Competition, singing and dancing competition at the party.
sentences.chinese: 晚会上，我们举行英语演讲比赛和歌舞比赛。

sentences.english: And so she saw this cabaret thing, and she signed us up.
sentences.chinese: 她知道了歌舞剧的事并帮我报了名。

sentences.english: Vaudeville was very popular in the United States during the early nineteen hundreds.
sentences.chinese: 在二十世纪初期，歌舞杂耍在美国城乡深受欢迎。

sentences.english: He was just starting to become known on the cabaret circuit .
sentences.chinese: 他在卡巴莱歌舞表演圈中刚刚开始有点名气。

sentences.english: There is also a supply of foreign Western Hotels, and some will have Tibetan song and dance performances.
sentences.chinese: 涉外宾馆里还供应西餐，有的还会有藏族歌舞表演。

sentences.english: A merry scene at Phnom Penh's night.
sentences.chinese: 金边的夜晚一片歌舞升平的景象。

sentences.english: "Pestle music" - A folk performance of song and dance, is very rare in Mainland China.
sentences.chinese: 民间艺术歌舞在中国大陆是很少见到的。

sentences.english: I'm fond of seeing musicals. The dancing is very beautiful and the music is pretty.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢看歌舞片，舞蹈十分美妙，而音乐又美丽动听。

sentences.english: The queen in the palace held a dance party.
sentences.chinese: 皇后在宫里举行了一场歌舞宴会。

sentences.english: Both Tibetan and Han ethnic dances are exhibited.
sentences.chinese: 汉藏民族歌舞同时展出。

sentences.english: British term for someone who introduces television acts or cabarets etc.
sentences.chinese: 英国对介绍电视表演或歌舞等节目的主持人的称呼。

sentences.english: Areas like Kabukicho offer an endless choice of nightlifedestinations.
sentences.chinese: 像歌舞伎町这样的地方为夜生活的提供了无尽的选择。

sentences.english: The Negro minstrel is touring the country.
sentences.chinese: 那个黑人歌舞团正在全国各地巡回演出。

sentences.english: Put to fly the white pigeon, the song and dance peace and prosperity, pursue peaceful that kind of atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 放飞白鸽，歌舞升平，追求和平的那种气氛。

definition: to add to the fun/to liven things up
can sing and dance (idiom); fig. a person of many talents
